nodes.text: The GT-09 Mobile Repair Unit was a model of maintenance droid used by the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. The Shroud's lieutenant Stangg employed GT-09 droids among the forces that defended the Shroud's base on the planet Quesh.

GT-09 Mobile Repair Units appear as enemies in the missions "A Secret Revealed" and "Scratch the Surface," which are the Republic and Imperial versions of a mission in the macrobinoculars mission in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
